columns.name: opt_in_status
columns.description: The Region opt-in status. The possible values are opt-in-not-required, opted-in, and not-opted-in

columns.name: partition
columns.description: The AWS partition in which the resource is located (aws, aws-cn, or aws-us-gov).

columns.name: region
columns.description: The AWS Region in which the resource is located.
